meanings.definition: To style or arrange (hair) in a marcel wave.
meanings.sent1: She decided to marceller her hair for the party.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, she would marceller her hair before going to work.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to marceller its fur with its tongue, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced through her hair, marcellering it into elegant waves.
meanings.sent5: The hairstylist's skillful hands could marceller any hair into a work of art.

meanings.definition: A person who specializes in creating marcel waves in hair.
meanings.sent1: The marceller at the salon always gave the best marcel waves.
meanings.sent2: She aspired to become a marceller and create beautiful hairstyles.
meanings.sent3: The marceller joked that they could make a marcel wave out of spaghetti.
meanings.sent4: In the world of hair, the marceller was a magician with their curling iron.
meanings.sent5: The famous marceller was known for transforming plain hair into glamorous waves.
